generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks running down the center, indicating it is a road used for vehicular traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along the sides of the street, separated from the road by curbs and buildings, which are characteristic of sidewalks.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial establishments with signage, confirming their presence.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and street signs, fitting the definition of poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible suspended above the road, indicating the presence of traffic control signals.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole, which qualifies as a traffic sign.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly in the distance, fitting the definition of vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a clear sky with some electrical wires, confirming the presence of sky.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Numerous cars are parked along both sides of the street, and some are in motion, clearly identifiable as cars.
- truck: A large black van is parked on the left side of the street, which qualifies as a truck.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
